info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A shower producing pea sized hail will impact portions of southern Litchfield County through 745 PM EDT... At 653 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower near New Milford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Milford, Oakville, Woodbury Center, Gaylordsville, New Preston, Watertown, Woodbury, Bethlehem, Washington, Roxbury, Bridgewater, Hotchkissville, Reynolds Bridge, Candlewood Trails, Pomeraug, Lower Merryall, Marble Dale, Upper Merryall, Delano Field and Erickson Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
